message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think you'll really like it!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. Would you consider selling it to me for $120?
I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $120. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though!
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Could we perhaps settle on $125 for the product?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob, but I'm still not quite there. I can do $135, but that's as low as I can go. Can you meet me there?
